message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations or personal needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $12000 to us. However, I am eager to make this opportunity more accessible for you. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10800. This offer includes all the features and benefits you would expect from such a high-quality item, plus an exclusive 10% discount. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.
